TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Msegasut, title = Msegasut, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Msegasut} }

S.FORM: msegasut 祭司 phiyug sapah brah na ka msegasut 祭司蓋屋前的責任 phiyug sapah brah na o asi ka kmeaguh msegasut gmdara rudux smapuh, rsuhan na dara rudux kana ka qngqaya djiyun smmalu sapah, kika hana prajing smmalu sapah da. Murug gaya Truku sbiyaw ka smapuh rusan na dara rudux kana ka phyugan sapah, duri ni pgblaiq, skbiyax hiyi ni aji hyyuya kingal ruwan sapah. mnhdu smmalu ka msegasut 祭司蓋屋完工的責任 Mnhdu smmalu do Kmeaguh duri msegasut murug gaya Truku gmdara kingal bubuy muda mqaras mgay smapuh, msegasut o daan na hmirit cicih kana keelgan hiyi babuy, lbuun na rnabaw tamul biqan na tnpusu sapah ni saan na gmqi uyung tqring dnamux, saw nii meysa utux rudan pqblaiq ni aji hyihuya kingal ruwan sapah. ida nkiya ni Truku sbiyaw 以前太魯閣族與自然 Ita Truku sbiyaw o smparu bi kana hmut mneudus ida nkiya, qngqaya smluun sapah o asi angal qhuni lnglingay sapah, erut o qrul, miying keelgan qhuni ka ngalan dha knuruh gasil,gmbari, sbiyaw balay ka dnamux o kurut aji uri o tapaq btunux, qnabil o tntunun dha meiluq sida qhuni smmalu saw nii sapah o Truku mkBaraw, Truku mkSiyaw o djima ka ngalan dha dnamux ni qnabil aji uri o bhngil. Sapah saw nii ga meuxul misan ni mtleetu rbagan, gnutu dha qnabil meiluq rqling sida qhuni ga mdngu do hglqun dha mtahu, nasi wada meelih ka qhuni qnabil do malan dha meiluq qhuni paah baraw qnabil. Sapah Truku sbiyaw o kmari yaa bi smka tnxalan rbqan tuma dxgal, kiya ka saan mtaqi kingal ruwan sapah,pmkayan,ini salu daka ka Truku sbiyaw, kiya ka kiya ni smmalu rpun,biyi rudux ni biyi babuy uri,saw nii knkla dha smmalu sapah ka rudan ta Truku sbiyaw. Niqan kingal ka uyas smdamat alang nniqan "Ga gaing bi kska suyang ayug, kiya ka alang mu saw smdamat. Tglihug muda rnaaw ni ayug gaga, elug bilaq dgiyaq o ga mtqiri hiya uri. powda dowriq ka tama qmita alang saw smdamat, liwaq msa rdax rusuq dowriq o ga htnay ska dowriq na"

msegasot 祭司 phiyog sapah brah na ka msegasot 祭司蓋屋前的責任 phiyog sapah brah na o asi ka kmeagoh msegasot gmdara rodox smapoh, rsohan na dara rodox kana ka qngqaya djiyon smmalo sapah, kika hana prajing smmalo sapah da. Morog gaya Troko sbiyaw ka smapoh rosan na dara rodox kana ka phyogan sapah, dori ni pgblaiq, skbiyax hiyi ni aji hyyoya kingal rowan sapah. mnhdo smmalo ka msegasot 祭司蓋屋完工的責任 Mnhdo smmalo do Kmeagoh dori msegasot morog gaya Troko gmdara kingal boboy moda mqaras mgay smapoh, msegasot o daan na hmirit cicih kana keelgan hiyi baboy, lboon na rnabaw tamol biqan na tnposo sapah ni saan na gmqi oyong tqring dnamox, saw nii meysa otox rodan pqblaiq ni aji hyihoya kingal rowan sapah. ida nkiya ni Troko sbiyaw 以前太魯閣族與自然 Ita Troko sbiyaw o smparo bi kana hmot mneodos ida nkiya, qngqaya smloon sapah o asi angal qhoni lnglingay sapah, erot o qrol, miying keelgan qhoni ka ngalan dha knoroh gasil,gmbari, sbiyaw balay ka dnamox o korot aji ori o tapaq btonox, qnabil o tntonon dha meiloq sida qhoni smmalo saw nii sapah o Troko mkBaraw, Troko mkSiyaw o djima ka ngalan dha dnamox ni qnabil aji ori o bhngil. Sapah saw nii ga meoxol misan ni mtleeto rbagan, gnoto dha qnabil meiloq rqling sida qhoni ga mdngo do hglqon dha mtaho, nasi wada meelih ka qhoni qnabil do malan dha meiloq qhoni paah baraw qnabil. Sapah Troko sbiyaw o kmari yaa bi smka tnxalan rbqan toma dxgal, kiya ka saan mtaqi kingal rowan sapah,pmkayan,ini salo daka ka Troko sbiyaw, kiya ka kiya ni smmalo rpon,biyi rodox ni biyi baboy ori,saw nii knkla dha smmalo sapah ka rodan ta Troko sbiyaw. Niqan kingal ka oyas smdamat alang nniqan "Ga gaing bi kska soyang ayog, kiya ka alang mo saw smdamat. Tglihog moda rnaaw ni ayog gaga, elog bilaq dgiyaq o ga mtqiri hiya ori. powda dowriq ka tama qmita alang saw smdamat, liwaq msa rdax rosoq dowriq o ga htnay ska dowriq na"
